description: USCA EN BANC OPINION as to 422 Notice of Appeal filed by LAUREL M LEE, 433 Notice of Cross Appeal filed by ROSEMARY MCCOY - We REVERSE the judgment of the district court and VACATE the challenged portions of its injunction.
